description: Try our easy to follow Watermelon Punch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Watermelon Punch Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500ml vodka cruiser juicy watermelon (2 x 275ml bottles)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar, juice and mint in a bowl. Stir until combined, crushing mint to extract flavour. Stand for 20 minutes for sugar to dissolve.

Meanwhile, process watermelon in a food processor until finely chopped. Strain through a fine sieve into a large bowl, discarding solids. Strain sugar mixture and add to watermelon pur√©e with Vodka Cruisers, sparkling water and ice. Pour into glasses and serve garnished with mint leaves.
